desc: Buhbay is a small family owned business in North Carolina that designs beautiful Scripture cards that come with a wooden stand. Our Scripture cards are great for gifts, to inspire you to memorize a weekly verse, or to display in your home or office as uplifting reminders that God loves us and keeps his promises.

layout.text:
Buy any Advent card set and get another 50% off!
Use coupon code: ADVENTBOGO
No limit! Stock up for family & friends.
